TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DirectorySearcher extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 对 Active Directory 域服务执行查询。

span.span: Performs queries against Active Directory Domain Services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用对象以搜索并执行针对使用轻型目录访问协议 (LDAP) 的 Active Directory 域服务层次结构的查询。Use a object to search and perform queries against an Active Directory Domain Services hierarchy using Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP). LDAP 是唯一系统提供 Active Directory 服务接口 (ADSI) 支持的提供程序目录搜索。LDAP is the only system-supplied Active Directory Service Interfaces (ADSI) provider that supports directory searching. 管理员可以使、 更改和删除层次结构中找到的对象。An administrator can make, alter, and delete objects that are found in the hierarchy. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 System.DirectoryServices](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ffa2f003-3a9a-4e2a-815e-825c8ddd7949)。For more information, see [Using System.DirectoryServices](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ffa2f003-3a9a-4e2a-815e-825c8ddd7949). 当你创建的实例，指定你想要检索，根和要检索的属性的可选列表。When you create an instance of , you specify the root you want to retrieve, and an optional list of properties to retrieve. 属性使您能够设置其他属性以执行以下任务：The property enables you to set additional properties to do the following tasks: - 缓存在本地计算机上的搜索结果。Cache the search results on the local computer. 设置属性`true`存储在本地计算机上的目录信息。Set the property to `true` to store directory information on the local computer. 对此本地缓存进行更新，提交到 Active Directory 域服务时，才调用方法。Updates are made to this local cache and committed to Active Directory Domain Services only when the method is called. - 指定时间长度的搜索，请使用属性。Specify the length of time to search, using the property. - 只检索属性名称。Retrieve attribute names only. 设置属性`true`检索仅已为其赋值的属性的名称。Set the property to `true` to retrieve only the names of attributes to which values have been assigned. - 执行分页的搜索。Perform a paged search. 设置属性指定在分页搜索中返回的对象的最大数目。Set the property to specify the maximum number of objects that are returned in a paged search. 如果不想执行分页的搜索，设置为其默认值零的属性。If you do not want to perform a paged search, set the property to its default of zero. - 指定要返回的最大项数使用属性。Specify the maximum number of entries to return, using the property. 如果你设置属性设置为其默认值零，服务器确定默认值为 1000 个条目。If you set the property to its default of zero, the server-determined default is 1000 entries. > [!NOTE] > 如果返回的条目和时间限制的最大数超过服务器设置的限制，服务器设置将优先于组件设置。If the maximum number of returned entries and time limits exceed the limitations that are set on the server, the server settings override the component settings. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. > [!NOTE] > 假设你已在使用此类之前大致了解 Active Directory 域服务。It is assumed that you have a general understanding of Active Directory Domain Services before using this class. 有关详细信息，请参阅概述。For more information, see the overview.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Asynchronous { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否异步执行搜索。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the search is performed asynchronously.

value.span: 如果异步执行搜索，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the search is asynchronous; otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AttributeScopeQuery { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要在其中进行搜索的识别名特性的 LDAP 显示名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the LDAP display name of the distinguished name attribute to search in.

summary.span: 只有一个特性可以用于此类型的搜索。

span.span: Only one attribute can be used for this type of search.

value.span: 要对其执行搜索的特性的 LDAP 显示名称；如果未设置任何特性范围查询，则为空字符串。

span.span: The LDAP display name of the attribute to perform the search against, or an empty string of no attribute scope query is set.

exception.span: 属性被设置为 以外的一个值。

span.span: The property is set to a value other than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CacheResults { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在客户计算机上缓存结果。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the result is cached on the client computer.

value.span: 如果在客户计算机上缓存结果，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the result is cached on the client computer; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果搜索返回大型结果集，将更有效率，如果此属性设置为搜索`false`以避免对客户端计算机设置的结果的传输。If the search returns a large result set, the search will be more efficient if this property is set to `false` to avoid the transfer of the result set to the client computer. 如果这样做，但是，你将不能对结果进行枚举两次，因为对象在每次调用时都创建一个新的枚举器对象。If you do so, however, you will not be able to enumerate the results twice, because the object creates a new enumerator object each time it is called.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ClientTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置客户端等候服务器返回结果的最长时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of time that the client waits for the server to return results.

summary.span: 如果服务器在此时间内不响应，则中止搜索，不返回任何结果。

span.span: If the server does not respond within this time, the search is aborted and no results are returned.

value.span: 一个 结构，包含客户端等待服务器返回结果的最长等待时间。

span.span: A structure that contains the maximum amount of time for the client to wait for the server to return results.

value.span: 默认值为 -1 秒，即表示无限期地等候。

span.span: The default value is -1 second, which means to wait indefinitely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的最小分辨率为一秒。The minimum resolution of this property is one second. 秒秒的小数部分将被忽略。Fractions of seconds are ignored. 如果在客户端超时、 服务器将返回其结果和客户端停止等待之前已到达。If the is reached before the client times out, the server returns its results and the client stops waiting. 最大服务器时间限制为 120 秒。The maximum server time limit is 120 seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::DereferenceAlias DerefAlias { System::DirectoryServices::DereferenceAlias get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::DereferenceAlias value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应如何解析搜索过程中找到的对象的别名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how the aliases of objects that are found during a search should be resolved.

value.span: 值，指定取消引用别名的行为。

span.span: A value that specifies the behavior in which aliases are dereferenced.

value.span: 此属性的默认设置为 。

span.span: The default setting for this property is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::DirectorySynchronization ^ DirectorySynchronization { System::DirectoryServices::DirectorySynchronization ^ get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::DirectorySynchronization ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置表示要与搜索一起使用的目录同步控件的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the directory synchronization control to use with the search.

value.span: 用于搜索的 对象。

span.span: The object for the search.

value.span: 如果不应使用目录同步控件，则为 。

span.span: if the directory synchronization control should not be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目录同步控件，通常称为 DirSync 控件，是用于要搜索的对象自以前的状态后已更改一个 LDAP 控件。The directory synchronization control, commonly referred to as the DirSync control, is an LDAP control that is used to search for objects that have changed since a previous state. 有关详细信息，请参阅主题"[轮询更改使用 DirSync 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/ad/ad/polling_for_changes_using_the_dirsync_control.asp)"在 MSDN 库中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the topic "[Polling for Changes Using the DirSync Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/ad/ad/polling_for_changes_using_the_dirsync_control.asp)" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果此方法既释放托管资源又释放非托管资源，则为 ；如果只释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: if this method releases both managed and unmanaged resources; if it releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象使用的托管资源，还可以选择释放非托管资源。

span.span: Releases the managed resources that are used by the object and, optionally, releases unmanaged resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::ExtendedDN ExtendedDN { System::DirectoryServices::ExtendedDN get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::ExtendedDN value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示识别名格式的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the format of the distinguished names.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示轻量目录访问协议 (LDAP) 格式筛选器字符串的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) format filter string.

value.span: 以 LDAP 格式表示的搜索筛选器，如“(objectClass=user)”。

span.span: The search filter string in LDAP format, such as "(objectClass=user)".

value.span: 默认值为“(objectClass=\*)”，它检索所有对象。

span.span: The default is "(objectClass=\*)", which retrieves all objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 筛选器使用以下准则：The filter uses the following guidelines: 1. 字符串必须括在括号中。The string must be enclosed in parentheses. 2. 表达式可以使用关系运算符： <， \<=、 =、 > =、 和 >。Expressions can use the relational operators: <, \<=, =, >=, and >. 一个示例是"(objectClass=user)"。An example is "(objectClass=user)". 另一个示例是"(姓氏 > = Davis)"。Another example is "(lastName>=Davis)". 3. 使用前缀运算符构成复合表达式 （& a) 和|。Compound expressions are formed with the prefix operators & and |. 一个示例是"(&(objectClass=user) (lastName = Davis))"。An example is "(&(objectClass=user)(lastName= Davis))". 另一个示例是"(&(objectClass=printer) (|(building=42)(building=43)))"。Another example is "(&(objectClass=printer)(|(building=42)(building=43)))". 当筛选器包含 ADS_UTC_TIME 类型的属性时，其值必须为 yyyymmddhhmmssZ 格式其中 y、 m、 d、 h、 m 和 s 独立的年、 月、 日、 小时、 分钟，其次，分别。When the filter contains an attribute of ADS_UTC_TIME type, its value must be of the yyyymmddhhmmssZ format where y, m, d, h, m, and s stand for year, month, day, hour, minute, and second, respectively. 秒 (ss) 值是可选的。The seconds (ss) value is optional. 最后一个字母 Z 意味着没有时间差异。The final letter Z means there is no time differential. 在这种格式，"上午 10:20:00In this format, "10:20:00 A.M. 可能 13，1999"变为"19990513102000Z"。May 13, 1999" becomes "19990513102000Z". 请注意 Active Directory 域服务将日期和时间存储为协调世界时 （格林威治标准时间）。Note that Active Directory Domain Services stores date and time as Coordinated Universal Time (Greenwich Mean Time). 如果不带时差指定一次，你在 GMT 时间中指定的时间。If you specify a time with no time differential, you are specifying the time in GMT time. 如果你不在协调世界时时区中，可以将差异值添加到协调世界时 （而不是指定 Z） 若要指定根据你所在的时区的时间。If you are not in the Coordinated Universal Time time zone, you can add a differential value to the Coordinated Universal Time (instead of specifying Z) to specify a time according to your time zone. 差异取决于以下： 差异 = 协调世界时-本地。The differential is based on the following: differential = Coordinated Universal Time- Local. 若要指定差异，请使用以下格式: [+ /-] hhmm yyyymmddhhmmss。To specify a differential, use the following format: yyyymmddhhmmss[+/-]hhmm. 例如，"晚上 8:52:58For example, "8:52:58 P.M. 3 月 23，1999"新西兰标准时间 （差异为 12 小时） 指定为"19990323205258.0 + 1200"。March 23, 1999" New Zealand Standard Time (the differential is 12 hours) is specified as "19990323205258.0+1200". 有关 LDAP 搜索字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅在 MSDN 库中的"搜索筛选器语法" [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information about the LDAP search string format, see "Search Filter Syntax" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection FindAll() cil managed

summary.span: 执行搜索并返回找到的项的集合。

span.span: Executes the search and returns a collection of the entries that are found.

returns.span: 包含搜索结果的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the results of the search.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于实现限制类不能在垃圾回收时释放所有非托管资源。Due to implementation restrictions, the class cannot release all of its unmanaged resources when it is garbage collected. 若要防止内存泄漏，你必须调用方法时不再需要对象。To prevent a memory leak, you must call the method when the object is no longer needed.

span.span: The specified is not a container.

exception.span: 正在使用的提供程序不支持搜索。

span.span: Searching is not supported by the provider that is being used.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.SearchResult FindOne() cil managed

summary.span: 执行搜索并只返回找到的第一项。

span.span: Executes the search and returns only the first entry that is found.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象包含搜索过程中找到的第一项。

span.span: A object that contains the first entry that is found during the search.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在搜索过程中找到多个项，则返回仅的第一个条目。If more than one entry is found during the search, only the first entry is returned. 如果找到任何条目以匹配搜索条件，空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 返回。If no entries are found to match the search criteria, a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PageSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示分页搜索中的页大小的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the page size in a paged search.

value.span: 服务器在分页搜索中能够返回的对象的最大数量。

span.span: The maximum number of objects the server can return in a paged search.

value.span: 默认值为零，即表示不进行分页搜索。

span.span: The default is zero, which means do not do a paged search.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已找到指定的对象数目的服务器后属性，它将停止搜索并向客户端返回结果。After the server has found the number of objects that are specified by the property, it will stop searching and return the results to the client. 当客户端请求更多的数据时，服务器将重新启动中断的位置搜索。When the client requests more data, the server will restart the search where it left off.

span.span: The new value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertiesToLoad As StringCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.StringCollectionEditor, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示搜索过程中要检索的属性列表。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the list of properties to retrieve during the search.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含搜索过程中要检索的属性集。

span.span: A object that contains the set of properties to retrieve during the search.

value.span: 默认值为空 ，即检索所有属性。

span.span: The default is an empty , which retrieves all properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要检索特定属性，将它们添加到此集合之前开始执行搜索。To retrieve specific properties, add them to this collection before you begin the search. 例如，`searcher.PropertiesToLoad.Add("phone");`将将 phone 属性添加到要在搜索中检索的属性列表。For example, `searcher.PropertiesToLoad.Add("phone");` will add the phone property to the list of properties to retrieve in the search. 在搜索过程始终检索属性"ADsPath"。The property "ADsPath" is always retrieved during the search. 上[!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)]和早期操作系统，执行搜索的帐户必须是要检索 ntSecurityDescriptor 属性的管理员组的成员。On [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)] and earlier operating systems, the account that performs the search must be a member of the Administrators group to retrieve the ntSecurityDescriptor property. 如果这不是这种情况，用于为 ntSecurityDescriptor 返回的属性值将`null`。If this is not the case, the property value that is returned for ntSecurityDescriptor will be `null`. 有关详细信息，请参阅主题"NT 安全描述符"MSDN 库中在[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the topic "NT-Security-Descriptor" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PropertyNamesOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示搜索是否只检索已经为其赋值的特性的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the search retrieves only the names of attributes to which values have been assigned.

value.span: 如果搜索只获取已经为其赋值的特性的名称，则为 ；如果搜索获取所有请求的特性的名称和值，则为 。

span.span: if the search obtains only the names of attributes to which values have been assigned; if the search obtains the names and values for all the requested attributes.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::DirectoryServices::ReferralChasingOption ReferralChasing { System::DirectoryServices::ReferralChasingOption get(); void set(System::DirectoryServices::ReferralChasingOption value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示如何追踪转交 (Referral) 的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how referrals are chased.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果根搜索未指定服务器的命名上下文或搜索结果时跨 （例如，如果在父域中具有子域和搜索） 的命名上下文中，服务器会将引用消息发送到的客户端的客户端可以 忽略或 chase。If the root search is not specified in the naming context of the server or when the search results cross a naming context (for example, when you have child domains and search in the parent domain), the server sends a referral message to the client that the client can either ignore or chase.

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which security access information for the specified attributes should be returned by the search.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ServerPageTimeLimit { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示服务器应该搜索单页结果的最长时间的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum amount of time the server should search for an individual page of results.

summary.span: 这不同于整个搜索的时间限制。

span.span: This is not the same as the time limit for the entire search.

value.span: 一个 ，表示服务器应该搜索一页结果的时间量。

span.span: A that represents the amount of time the server should search for a page of results.

value.span: 默认值为 -1 秒，即表示无限期地搜索。

span.span: The default value is -1 seconds, which means to search indefinitely.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的最小分辨率为一秒。The minimum resolution of this property is one second. 秒秒的小数部分将被忽略。Fractions of seconds are ignored. 达到时间限制后，服务器将停止搜索，并返回的结果，最多将累积的点，以及包含有关在何处恢复搜索的信息的 cookie。When the time limit is reached, the server stops searching and returns the results that have accumulated up to that point, along with a cookie containing the information about where to resume searching. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于搜索其中设置为一个值，不是默认值为-1。This property only applies to searches where is set to a value that is not the default of -1.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ServerTimeLimit { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置指示服务器在进行搜索时可花费的最长时间的值。

span.span: The property gets or sets a value indicating the maximum amount of time the server spends searching.

summary.span: 如果达到时间限制，则只返回在该时间之前查找到的项。

span.span: If the time limit is reached, only entries that are found up to that point are returned.

value.span: 一个 ，表示服务器应该执行搜索的时间长度。

span.span: A that represents the amount of time that the server should search.

value.span: 默认值为 -1 秒，即表示使用服务器确定的默认值 120 秒。

span.span: The default value is -1 seconds, which means to use the server-determined default of 120 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的最小分辨率为一秒。The minimum resolution of this property is one second. 秒秒的小数部分将被忽略。Fractions of seconds are ignored. 与不同属性，属性指示上搜索服务器将花费的时间总量。Unlike the property, the property indicates the total amount of time that the server will spend on a search. 达到时间限制后，服务器将停止搜索，并返回结果，将累积到该点为止。When the time limit is reached, the server stops searching and returns the results that have accumulated up to that point. 设置到-1 秒的时间来使用服务器确定默认值。Set to -1 second to use the server-determined default. > [!NOTE] > 如果你设置为大于服务器确定默认值为 120 秒值，使用服务器确定默认值。If you set to a value that is larger than the server-determined default of 120 seconds, the server-determined default is used. 达到了服务器时间限制后，无法继续从中断处搜索。After the server time limit is reached, you cannot continue a search from where it left off.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SizeLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示服务器在搜索中返回的最大对象数量的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of objects that the server returns in a search.

value.span: 服务器在搜索中返回的对象的最大数量。

span.span: The maximum number of objects that the server returns in a search.

value.span: 默认值为零，即表示使用由服务器确定的默认大小限制 1000 项。

span.span: The default value is zero, which means to use the server-determined default size limit of 1000 entries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索后的大小限制为止，并返回结果在服务器停止累积到该点为止。The server stops searching after the size limit is reached and returns the results accumulated up to that point. > [!NOTE] > 如果你设置为大于 1000 个条目服务器确定默认值，使用服务器确定默认值。If you set to a value that is larger than the server-determined default of 1000 entries, the server-determined default is used.

span.span: The new value is less than zero.
